entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
